item.title: Report E-2024070204
item.description:
Report E-2024070204

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-12T15:12:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-11
  • City: LITHIA SPRINGS
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG LOGISTICS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 125000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC unit was traveling on Thornton Road near Lithia Springs, Georgia. The driver took evasive action in order to avoid impacting stopped traffic and went off the roadway and rolled over. The tank trailer was compromised and approximately 350 gallons of gasoline was released. Hepaco Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.

item.title: Report E-2024070182
item.description:
Report E-2024070182

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-08
  • City: CALHOUN
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately Twenty (20) gallons of material released from one (1) 55-gallon metal drum due to a forklift puncture. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight cleaned the impacted area, and the damaged drum was overpacked. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
